text: 2.10: 1 Ko 3.9; 2 Ko 5.5; 5.17; Ef 4.24; Ta 2.14Fhe Bakɨme Krais Zisasan panan, ana nza muuŋgim, nza won ndava vura tɨvi vhɨzgiap, nza tɨvir ŋkaa zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi ki. Nza ntigem mba Fhe Bakɨme fhum nza nzuav, mba tɨvir vhuuiŋ zɨn vui tuav, ana ana bevahegim, ana ki. Nza ntigem mba tuavar ŋgɨrga.
